title: How do I get my Gmail notifications back?
content:
No notifications on notifications bar or notification dot on app icon.

All notifications were on, turned off and turned on again. Phone restarted several times. Gmail disabled (cannot uninstall/reinstall on Pixel) and re-enabled. Still no notifications.

Email is available as soon as it comes in so there is not a syncing issue with the account.

I called Google One support and they directed me to post here.

 - 12/9/19 Still an issue and waiting for a response
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
